Vernon Lees

Vernon Lees is a financial trader and writer who has considerable experience in both market analysis and strategy development. With a background in IT and product development, he quit his full time job to take up trading full time in 2007.

Over the last six years he has successfully developed and traded a number of financial strategies, focusing on a number of different markets.

He is a keen trader of stocks, indices and the foreign exchange markets, making use of both technical and fundamental approaches to identify and validate trading opportunities.

Vernon was first introduced to binary options trading in 2006 and since then, he has been using the Binary.com trading platform as part of his core investment strategy.

Binary Options Trading System In A Diary 2015

Vernon has just recently published a new e-book entitled, “Binary options trading system in a dairy 2015.”

The diary is based on Vernon Lees' daily, weekly and monthly analysis which he conducts across a range of financial instruments, including Forex, Indices and Commodities on an annual basis. It provides an “automatic” binary options trading system which is based on historic mathematical probabilities. It highlights trading opportunities where there is a high probability chance of winning*.

Vernon Lees says, “although this diary is not my core trading strategy, I have been compiling, sharing and trading this high probability trading system since 2008. It is so simple to trade and time efficient that I use it to complement my other trading strategies.

The analysis in this diary allows me to identify high probability weekly and monthly trading opportunities up to 12 months in advance. This helps me to plan my trading, effectively setting it on autopilot."

Click to download "Binary Options Trading System In A Diary 2015".
